Detailed Description

The "MainWindow" - where the user can select preferences, file bug reports, check for updates etc. All members marked one require a connection to the server to populate. Fergus Morrow fergus@enopen.co.uk

- (IBAction) loadTab: (id)  sender  

Every NSToolbarItem goes to this, it acts upon the NSToolbarItem's identifier and changes the active NSTabViewItem.
